meanings.definition: Come to a resolution or decision.
meanings.sent1: I must decide whether to wear a red or blue shirt.
meanings.sent2: She will decide on the best time to leave for the party.
meanings.sent3: The cat had to decide if it wanted to nap in the sun or the shade.
meanings.sent4: The puzzle pieces had to decide where they fit together to complete the picture.
meanings.sent5: The detective had to decide which suspect was guilty based on the evidence.

meanings.sent1: The judge will decide the winner of the competition.
meanings.sent2: They need to decide the location for the new playground.
meanings.sent3: The magic eight ball decided that the answer was uncertain.
meanings.sent4: The scientist decided the experiment was a success after analyzing the results.
meanings.sent5: The referee had to decide if the goal was valid or not.

meanings.definition: Make a choice from a number of alternatives.
meanings.sent1: I have to decide between pizza or pasta for dinner.
meanings.sent2: He will decide which movie to watch at the cinema.
meanings.sent3: The children had to decide if they wanted to play tag or hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: The student decided to pick the blue crayon for coloring the sky.
meanings.sent5: The hiker had to decide which trail to take for the best view of the sunset.
